About Me

BIO

I love running.. and running code ;) and am currently in my third year at the University of Southern California. I try my best to do the small things I can.

InstaSafe

Full-stack Development Intern

• Instasafe is a cloud delivered cybersecurity service, that protects high risk applications, against existing and emerging threats • I worked on visualization of the security data and helped the customer understand their applications security and access. • Gained further knowledge and training in Angular, React, React Native, PHP Laravel, D3 and Python. • The force graph I created shows the points where a serious threat can emerge from, in addition, the product helps the user create smart security protocols that can shut down any attack at an earlier stage.

Fastah

Web Development Intern

• Fastah is a service that specializes in measuring latency and internet speed data. • Raised mobile network awareness to fuel the growth of the ride sharing market in India. • Gained further knowledge and training in JavaScript, CSS, HTML and working in a Linux environment. • Designed a twitter bot, using the Twitter API, to broadcast live internet weather.

Data science and operations USC

Data Analysis Assistant

• Helped designed the course, construct tests, prepare materials and grade assignments. • Gained further understanding of optimization techniques in Python.
